Notifications.TrickNotification: HARR! Ye've been bamboozled, ye scurvy dog!
Notifications.TreatNotification: Arrr! Ye found yerself some treasure!

Items.EventTokenDescription: A cursed doubloon for the ghostly merchant during the 2025 Halloween plunderin'.

Shop.Title: Cursed Merchant
Shop.BuyItemsDescription: Use yer cursed doubloons to get some exclusive Halloween booty, savvy?
Shop.ShopTitle: Welcome to the Cursed Merchant, ye landlubber!
Shop.ShopDescription: Welcome to the Cursed Merchant! Use yer cursed doubloons to get some exclusive Halloween booty.
Shop.BuyTitle: Buy booty from the Cursed Merchant
Shop.BuyDescription: Select an item to purchase using yer cursed doubloons.
Shop.InputPurchaseAmount: Enter the amount ye wish to purchase:
Shop.ItemNotForSale: This booty ain't for sale, matey.
Shop.NotEnoughTokens: Ye don't have enough cursed doubloons to complete this purchase, ye broke pirate!
